name: Tamabud!
description:
Hello everyone! This is Tamabud™, a standard virtual pet game that holds absolutely no secrets! especially if you press the QUIT button! wink wink

 This game was developed for the GDevelop Game Jam #2, following the theme of "Pets and/or Companions". 

The art, music and programming were made by me, during the duration of the jam.

 Liluo.io link: https://liluo.io/enigmagical/tamabud

I sincerely hope you will be amused. :)
